about_the_game:
Can you make it to the top of the Tower of Friendship? Run, jump, climb, fall all the way back down, and do it all again. Inspired by games like Only Up! and Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy, this hardcore platformer will test your abilities and your patience.

Start at the bottom of the tower and slowly climb higher and higher. Run along easy paths, jump between spaced platforms, and even grab ledges and pull yourself up if a jump falls a little short. Beware though, there are no checkpoints, and falling off usually leads to falling all the way back down.

Play by yourself or with up to 7 other friends! Be nice and lay down to extend platforms and make hard jumps easier for others, or push each other off when the falls are the highest. There is also a hide-and-seek mode, which allows you to better explore the environment and play various games with your friends.

There will also be rest stops along the way, with large, safe platforms you can relax on before continuing the climb up. Listen to some nice music, take in the scenery, or go grab a snack. Some of the rest stops will have minigames you can play with your friends, like sumo wrestling, ball pits, or parkour competitions.

This game is not for everyone, if you get frustrated easily, or don't want to be stuck doing the same thing for a long time, this game is probably not for you. However, you will be able to save your progress when you quit the game, so you can pick back up where you left off for your next play session.

Can you successfully navigate to the top of the tower? Watch your step and make calculated decisions, or send it and brazenly climb. But whatever you do, never stop squeebing.

Some of the rest stops will have minigames you can play with your friends, like sumo wrestling, ball pits, or parkour competitions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: 6th Gen Intel Core i5 or 1st Gen AMD R5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: 10th Gen Intel Core i5 or 3rd Gen AMD R5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Can you make it to the top of the Tower of Friendship? Run, jump, climb, fall, and then do it all again. Play by yourself or with your friends. Be nice and lay down to make jumps easier for others, or push each other off when the falls are the highest. But whatever you do, never stop squeebing.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
